text: Mari Indus railway station () is located in Mari Indus, Pakistan. ==Train routes== The following trains stop/terminate/originate from Mari Indus station: ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Mianwali District Category:Railway stations on Daud Khel–Lakki Marwat Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
